arts.ttl: McKennie stunner helps Juve take lead over PSV
arts.sum: Juventus substitute Samuel Mbangula snatched a late winner and U.S. midfielder Weston McKennie scored a stunner goal as the Italian giants beat PSV Eindhoven 2-1 in the first leg of their Champions League knockout phase playoff tie on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Juventus Player Ratings vs PSV: Influential Gatti Imposes His Will
arts.sum: The Bianconeri scored the opener thanks to Weston McKennie. After the break, Ivan Perisic stunned the home crowds by snatching the equalizer. Nevertheless, the home side restored their lead thanks to Samuel Mbangula. So here are our player ratings for Juventus who gained a slim advantage in their double header against PSV. arts.ttl: Champions League: PSV suffer narrow loss against Juventus
arts.sum: PSV Eindhoven suffered a narrow 2-1 loss to Juventus in the first leg of their Champions League playoff. PSV had already lost 3-1 to Juventus earlier in the season and Peter Bosz’s side went into the game on the back of a disappointing 1-1 draw against Willem II. arts.ttl: Champions League | Juventus 2-1 PSV: Match Report
arts.sum: Juventus secured a slim advantage in their Champions League play-off tie against PSV Eindhoven, winning 2-1 at the Allianz Stadium in Turin. The victory gives the Italian side a slight edge heading into the second leg in the Netherlands on February 19.
